00022 #define           FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_POS_Y                        LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 72

00024 #define           FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_OFFSET_Y               109

00027 #define           FLORIST_CARD_CARD_HEIGHT                        100

00063 BOOLEAN EnterFloristCards()
00064 {
00065       UINT16 i, j, usPosX, usPosY;
00066   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00067       UINT8                               ubCount;
00068 
00069       InitFloristDefaults();
00070 
00071       // load the Flower Account Box graphic and add it
00072       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00073       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\CardBlank.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00074       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCardBackground));
00075 
00076       ubCount = 0;
00077       usPosY = FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_POS_Y;
00078       for(j=0; j<3; j++)
00079       {
00080             usPosX = FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_POS_X;
00081             for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00082             {
00083                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristCardsRegion[ubCount], usPosX, usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX + FLORIST_CARD_CARD_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY + FLORIST_CARD_CARD_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00084                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristCardsRegionCallBack ); 
00085                   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFloristCardsRegion[ubCount]); 
00086                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedFloristCardsRegion[ubCount], 0, ubCount );  
00087                   ubCount++;
00088                   usPosX += FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_OFFSET_X;
00089             }
00090             usPosY += FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_OFFSET_Y;
00091       }
00092 
00093 
00094       guiFlowerCardsButtonImage     = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\FloristButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00095 
00096       guiFlowerCardsBackButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiFlowerCardsButtonImage, sFloristCards[FLORIST_CARDS_BACK], FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_FONT, 
00097                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_UP_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00098                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_DOWN_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00099                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00100                                                                                FLORIST_CARD_BACK_BUTTON_X, FLORIST_CARD_BACK_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00101                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnFlowerCardsBackButtonCallback);
00102       SetButtonCursor(guiFlowerCardsBackButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00103 
00104 
00105       //passing the currently selected card to -1, so it is not used
00106       gbCurrentlySelectedCard = -1;
00107 
00108       RenderFloristCards();
00109       return(TRUE);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void ExitFloristCards()
00113 {
00114       UINT8 i;
00115 
00116       RemoveFloristDefaults();
00117       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCardBackground );
00118 
00119       //card gallery 
00120       for(i=0; i<9; i++)
00121             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristCardsRegion[i]);
00122 
00123       UnloadButtonImage( guiFlowerCardsButtonImage );
00124       RemoveButton( guiFlowerCardsBackButton );
00125 }

00132 void RenderFloristCards()
00133 {
00134       UINT8 i,j, ubCount;
00135       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
00136       wchar_t           sTemp[ 640 ];
00137       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00138   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00139       UINT16            usHeightOffset;
00140 
00141       DisplayFloristDefaults();
00142 
00143       DrawTextToScreen( sFloristCards[FLORIST_CARDS_CLICK_SELECTION], FLORIST_CARD_TITLE_SENTENCE_X, FLORIST_CARD_TITLE_SENTENCE_Y, FLORIST_CARD_TITLE_SENTENCE_WIDTH, FONT10ARIAL, FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00144 
00145       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiCardBackground);
00146       usPosY = FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_POS_Y;
00147       ubCount = 0;
00148       for(j=0; j<3; j++)
00149       {
00150             usPosX = FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_POS_X;
00151             for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00152             {
00153                   //The flowe account box
00154                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, usPosX, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00155 
00156                   //Get and display the card saying
00157                   uiStartLoc = FLOR_CARD_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE * ubCount;
00158                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(FLOR_CARD_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_CARD_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE);
00159 
00160 //                DisplayWrappedString((UINT16)(usPosX+7), (UINT16)(usPosY+15), FLORIST_CARD_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sTemp, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00161                         usHeightOffset = IanWrappedStringHeight( (UINT16)(usPosX+7), (UINT16)(usPosY), FLORIST_CARD_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, 
00162                                                                                            FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_COLOR, sTemp, 
00163                                                                                            0, FALSE, 0);
00164 
00165                         usHeightOffset = ( FLORIST_CARD_TEXT_HEIGHT - usHeightOffset ) / 2;
00166 
00167 
00168                         IanDisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(usPosX+7), (UINT16)(usPosY+10+usHeightOffset), FLORIST_CARD_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, 
00169                                                                                            FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_CARDS_SENTENCE_COLOR, sTemp, 
00170                                                                                            0, FALSE, 0);
00171 
00172                   ubCount++;
00173                   usPosX += FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_OFFSET_X;
00174             }
00175             usPosY += FLORIST_CARD_FIRST_OFFSET_Y;
00176       }
00177 
00178   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00179       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00180   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00181 }

00184 
00185 void SelectFloristCardsRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00186 { 
00187       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00188       {
00189       }
00190       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00191       {
00192             gbCurrentlySelectedCard = (UINT8) MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00193 
00194             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_ORDERFORM;
00195       }
00196       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00197       {
00198       } 
00199 }
00200 
00201 
00202 
00203 void BtnFlowerCardsBackButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00204 {
00205       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00206       {
00207             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00208             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00209       }
00210       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00211       {
00212             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00213             {
00214                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00215 
00216                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_ORDERFORM;
00217 
00218                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00219             }
00220       }
00221       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00222       {
00223             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00224             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00225       }
00226 }
